mapper.update:
update AFC_ACCOUNT
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLE_BALANCE = #{settleBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMISSION_TOTAL = #{commissionTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMISSIONING = #{commissioning,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WITHDRAWING = #{withdrawing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHBACKING = #{cashbacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_USED = #{depositUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update AFC_ACCOUNT set BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLE_BALANCE = #{settleBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMISSION_TOTAL = #{commissionTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMISSIONING = #{commissioning,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WITHDRAWING = #{withdrawing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHBACKING = #{cashbacking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT_USED = #{depositUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
